links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..60
mathematica: Prime@Fibonacci@Range@50 (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Apr 11 2011 *)Table[Prime[Fibonacci[n]], {n, 40}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 14 2016 *)
